txt.en: 'If you are looking for more work in the area of the Great Wheel, I would suggest you find Foreman Indrith. He headed down there some time ago, and rumour has it that he is holed up there. Apparently, the fungus was not reason enough for him to abandon his charge.\n\n'He may require your assistance. He'll probably be within the Wheel-house, beneath the Great Wheel.'

'Ansurr sent you to aid me? You must be hearty to have made it through the creatures and the fungus. That is good to know, for I have work to do here, and if you are willing to labour hard, I am willing to set you to work.'
'You may find Foreman Indrith in the Wheel-house, beneath the Great Wheel, south-west of Hulwul-nefekh.'
Foreman Indrith made his way into the Wheel-house within the Great Wheel of the Water-works. The dwarves of Hulwul-nefekh are concerned that he may need help there.
Talk to Foreman Indrith in the Wheel-house
Foreman Indrith is in the Wheel-house, beneath the Great Wheel, south-west of Hulwul-nefekh.\n\nAnsurr suggested to seek out Foreman Indrith and aid him however you may.
